Cloak.card_desc: [Hidden] Increase the duration of Hidden by {scale=1|1}s.

Confound.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Reduce the Cooldown of Smoke Screen by {scale=0.5|0.5}s for each enemy hit by Poison Bolts.

Debilitate.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Increase the damage done by Poison Bolts by 25% and the rate at which they deal damage by 100%.

Decrepify.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] You do not consume Ammo for {scale=0.6|0.6}s after hitting an enemy with Poison Bolts.

Dissipate.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after entering Smoke Screen.

Emergency Exit.card_desc: [Hidden] Automatically enter Stealth after dropping to or below 30% Health. This can happen once every {scale=25|-5}s.

Healing Vapors.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Heal for {scale=100|100} over 2s after entering Smoke Screen.

Nimble Fingers.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Increase your Reload Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 5s after using Poison Bolts.

Ninja.card_desc: [Hidden] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=5|5}% while Hidden is active.

Poisoner.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Reduce the Cooldown of Poison Bolts by {scale=1|1}s.

Preparation.card_desc: [Armor] Killing Blows reset your Cooldowns and Heal you for 500.

Quick Smoker.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Reduce the Cooldown of Smoke Screen by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Shadow Affinity.card_desc: [Hidden] Reduce the Cooldown of Hidden by {scale=1|1}s.

Slip Away.card_desc: [Armor] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=3|3}% while Out of Combat.

Smoke and Dagger.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Smoke Screen Heals allies within for 400 every 1s.

Specter.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Increase the duration of Smoke Screen by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Tactical Reload.card_desc: [Weapon] Generate {scale=3|3} Ammo after getting an Elimination.

Victory Rush.card_desc: [Weapon] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=10|10}% for 8s after getting an Elimination.

Aufl\u00f6sung.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Betrittst du die Nebelwand, erhöht sich dein Lauftempo 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Deckmantel.card_desc: [Verborgen] Erhöht die Dauer von Verborgen um {scale=1|1}s.

Entkr\u00e4ften.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Nach Treffern mit Giftbolzen verbrauchst du {scale=0.6|0.6}s lang keine Munition.

Entwischen.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo außerhalb des Kampfes um {scale=3|3}%.

Flinke Finger.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Nach Verwendung von Giftbolzen erhöht sich dein Nachladetempo 5s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Geschw\u00e4cht.card_desc: [Geschwächt] Erhöht den Schaden von Giftbolzen um 25% und die Tickrate um 100%.

Gespenst.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Erhöht die Dauer von Nebelwand um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Giftmischung.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Giftbolzen um {scale=1|1}s.

Heilschwaden.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Betrittst du die Nebelwand, wirst du über 2s {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Nebelmaschine.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Nebelwand um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Verborgen] Erhöht dein Lauftempo während Verborgen um {scale=5|5}%.

Notausgang.card_desc: [Verborgen] Fällst du auf oder unter 30% Gesundheit, wirst du automatisch getarnt. Nur einmal alle {scale=25|-5}s möglich.

Schattenaffinit\u00e4t.card_desc: [Verborgen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Verborgen um {scale=1|1}s.

Siegesrausch.card_desc: [Waffe] Eliminierungen erhöhen dein Lauftempo 8s lang um {scale=10|10}%.

Stich im Nebel.card_desc: [Nebelwand] Verbündete innerhalb der Nebelwand werden pro Sekunde 400 LP geheilt.

Verbl\u00fcffung.card_desc: [Giftbolzen] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Nebelwand für jeden mit Giftbolzen getroffenen Gegner um {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Vorbereitung.card_desc: [Rüstung] Todesstöße setzen alle Abklingzeiten zurück und du wirst 500 LP geheilt.

Adresse.card_desc: [Carreaux empois.] Votre vitesse de rechargement augmente de {scale=10|10}% pendant 5s après Carreaux empoisonnés.

Affaiblissement.card_desc: [Carreaux empoisonnés] Les Carreaux empoisonnés infligent 25% de dégâts supplémentaires et agissent deux fois plus vite.

D\u00e9concert\u00e9.card_desc: [Carreaux empois.] Chaque Carreau empoisonné réussi réduit le temps de recharge d'Écran de fumée de {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

D\u00e9cr\u00e9pitude.card_desc: [Carreaux empoisonnés] Quand Carreaux empoisonnés touche un ennemi, vous ne consommez pas de munition pendant {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Dissipation.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Passer dans l'Écran de fumée augmente votre vitesse de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s.

\u00c9clipse.card_desc: [Armure] Votre vitesse hors combat augmente de {scale=3|3}%.

Empoisonneuse.card_desc: [Carreaux empois.] Les Carreaux empoisonnés se rechargent {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Exhalaisons curatives.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Les alliés à l'intérieur d'Écran de fumée regagnent 400 PV par seconde.

Fum\u00e9e envahissante.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Écran de fumée se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Inhalation.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Passer dans l'Écran de fumée vous rend {scale=100|100} PV en 2s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Dissimulation] Dissimulation augmente votre vitesse de déplacement de {scale=5|5}%.

Pr\u00e9paration.card_desc: [Armure] Chaque exécution vous rend 500 PV et réinitialise les temps de recharge actifs.

Ru\u00e9e vers la gloire.card_desc: [Arme] Chaque élimination augmente votre vitesse de {scale=10|10}% pendant 8s.

Sortie de secours.card_desc: [Dissimulation] Passer en dessous de 30% de PV vous rend invisible. Ne peut se produire qu'une fois toutes les {scale=25|-5}s.

Spectre.card_desc: [Écran de fumée] Écran de fumée dure {scale=0.6|0.6}s de plus.

\u4e58\u80dc\u8ffd\u51fb.card_desc: [武器] 参与击败后8秒内，提升 {scale=10|10}% 移动速度

\u5e7d\u5f71\u7279\u5de5.card_desc: [烟雾弹] 增加烟雾弹的持续时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u5fcd\u8005.card_desc: [隐身] 隐身状态下移动速度提升{scale=5|5}%

\u6218\u672f\u88c5\u586b.card_desc: [武器] 参与击败会回复{scale=3|3}发弹药

\u6295\u6bd2\u8005.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 减少剧毒箭矢的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u6697\u5f71\u4eb2\u548c.card_desc: [隐身] 减少隐身的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u6697\u5f71\u6597\u7bf7.card_desc: [隐身] 隐身持续时间增加{scale=1|1}秒

\u66ae\u5149\u62a4\u7532I.card_desc: [护甲] 获得{scale=14|14}%控制抗性和减速抗性

\u6cbb\u7597\u55b7\u96fe.card_desc: [烟雾弹] 进入烟雾弹范围时会在4秒内回复{scale=100|100} 点生命值

\u6d88\u6563.card_desc: [烟雾弹] 在烟雾弹范围内获得{scale=10|10}%的移动速度加成，持续3秒

\u7075\u52a8.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 使用此技能后，你的装填速度提高{scale=10|10}%，持续5秒

\u70df\u96fe\u6218\u672f.card_desc: [烟雾弹] 减少烟雾弹的冷却时间{scale=1|1}秒

\u7d27\u6025\u9003\u751f.card_desc: [隐身] 当生命值低于30%时你将自动进入隐身状态，这个效果每{scale=25|-5}秒只能触发一次

\u811a\u5e95\u62b9\u6cb9.card_desc: [护甲] 在非战斗状态下移动速度提高{scale=3|3}%

\u8870\u5f31\u6bd2\u836f.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 剧毒箭矢现在会造成30%额外伤害，且发作速度加倍。

\u8870\u7aed.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 剧毒箭矢命中的目标受到的治疗效果降低{scale=15|15}%，持续3秒

\u8ff7\u60d1.card_desc: [剧毒箭矢] 剧毒箭矢每次命中敌人时，烟雾弹的冷却时间降低{scale=0.5|0.5}秒

\u96fe\u4e0e\u5200.card_desc: [烟雾弹] 烟雾弹会造成600点伤害

\u9884\u8c0b.card_desc: [护甲] 击败敌人时所有技能的冷却时间重置，且自身回复500点生命值

Cloak.card_desc: [Hidden] Hidden lasts 2s longer and removes you from combat.

Confound.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Enemies hit by Smoke Screen are Confused for 1.5s.

Corrode.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Increase the maximum number of stacks of Poison Bolts by 1.

Decrepify.card_desc: [Poison Bolts] Your poison bolts reduce the target’s healing by {5/10/15/20}%

Dismantle.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Smoke Screen stuns Deployables for {2}s.

Emergency Exit.card_desc: [Hidden] You automatically enter Stealth when you drop below 30% Health. This effect can happen once every 40s.

Pollute.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Enemy pets and deployables inside of Smoke Screen are Stunned for 2s

Preparation.card_desc: [Armor] On successful kill or elimination, lower all your active Cooldowns by 25%

Shadow Affinity.card_desc: [Hidden] Reduce the cooldown of Hidden by 1s and you can mount while in stealth.

Smother.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Increase the duration and radius of smoke screen by 15%.

Specter.card_desc: [Smoke Screen] Enter stealth that lasts 2s immediately upon entering your own Smoke Screen.

Surprise Attack.card_desc: [Hidden] Your first shot out of stealth applies a poison dealing 100 damage over 3s.

Tactical Reload.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain 3 max ammo count. Dealing a killing blow to a player instantly restores 5 ammo.

Victory Rush.card_desc: [Weapon] Gain 15% Attack Speed for 12s after getting a kill

Aparici\u00f3n.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] La duración de Cortina de humo aumenta en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Atracci\u00f3n umbr\u00eda.card_desc: [Ocultar] Se reduce la recarga de Ocultar en {scale=1|1}s.

Capa.card_desc: [Ocultar] La duración de Ocultar aumenta un {scale=1|1}s.

Confundir.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] Se reduce la recarga de Cortina de humo en {scale=0.5|0.5}s por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Descarga venenosa.

Debilitar.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] El daño infligido por Descarga venenosa aumenta un 25% y el ritmo al que inflige daño un 100%.

Decremento.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] No consumes munición durante {scale=0.6|0.6}s tras alcanzar a un enemigo con Descarga venenosa.

Dedos \u00e1giles.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] Tu velocidad de recarga aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 5s tras usar Descarga venenosa.

Diseminaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s al entrar en la Cortina de humo.

Envenenadora.card_desc: [Descarga venenosa] Se reduce la recarga de Descarga venenosa en {scale=1|1} s.

Esfumarse.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=3|3}% mientras estés fuera de combate

Fumador raudo.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] Se reduce la recarga de Cortina de humo en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Humareda.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS durante 2s al entrar en la Cortina de humo.

Humo y daga.card_desc: [Cortina de humo] Cortina de humo cura a los aliados que estén en su interior 400 PS cada 1s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Ocultar] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=5|5}% mientras esté activo Ocultar.

Preparaci\u00f3n.card_desc: [Armadura] Todas tus recargas se restablecen y te curas 500 PS al asestar golpes de gracia.

Recarga t\u00e1ctica.card_desc: [Armas] Recuperas {scale=3|3} de munición tras conseguir una eliminación.

Salida de emergencia.card_desc: [Ocultar] Entras en sigilo automáticamente cuando tienes un 30% o menos de salud. Esto puede activarse una vez cada {scale=25|-5}s.

Victoria adictiva.card_desc: [Arma] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=10|10}% durante 8s tras conseguir una eliminación.

Afinidade Sombria.card_desc: [Escondida] Reduz o intervalo de Escondida em {scale=1|1}s.

Armadura Obscura.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=3|3} a sua munição máxima.

Capa.card_desc: [Escondida] Aumenta a duração de Escondida em {scale=1|1}s.

Confundir.card_desc: [Dardos Tóxicos] Reduz o intervalo da Nuvem de Fumaça em {scale=0.5|0.5}s a cada inimigo atingido com os Dardos Tóxicos.

Debilitar.card_desc: [Debilitar] Aumenta em 25% o dano causado pelos Dardos Tóxicos, e eles agem 100% mais rápido.

Dedos \u00c1geis.card_desc: [Dardos Tóxicos] Aumenta a velocidade para recarregar sua arma em {scale=10|10}% por 5s após usar os Dardos Tóxicos.

Dissipar.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% sua velocidade de movimento por 2s ao entrar na Nuvem de Fumaça.

Envenenado.card_desc: [Dardos Tóxicos] Você não consume munição por {scale=0.6|0.6}s após atingir um inimigo com os Dardos Tóxicos.

Envenenadora.card_desc: [Dardos Tóxicos] Reduz o intervalo dos Dardos Tóxicos em {scale=1|1}s.

Escapulir.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=3|3}% enquanto estiver fora do combate.

Espectro.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Aumenta duração da Nuvem de Fumaça em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Fuma\u00e7a e Adaga.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Nuvem de Fumaça cura os aliados dentro dela em 400 de vida a cada 1s.

Fuma\u00e7a R\u00e1pida.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Reduz o intervalo da Nuvem de Fumaça em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Ninja.card_desc: [Escondida] Aumenta a velocidade de movimento em {scale=5|5}% enquanto estiver Escondida.

Prepara\u00e7\u00e3o.card_desc: [Armadura] Dar o golpe fatal zera seus intervalos e cura você em 500 de vida.

Recarga T\u00e1tica.card_desc: [Arma] Gera {scale=3|3}de munição após conseguir uma eliminação.

Sa\u00edda de Emerg\u00eancia.card_desc: [Escondida] Automaticamente entra em furtividade ao chegar a 30% ou menos de vida. O efeito ocorre a cada {scale=25|-5}s.

Vapores Curativos.card_desc: [Nuvem de Fumaça] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida no decorrer de 2s após entrar na Nuvem de Fumaça.

Velocidade da Vit\u00f3ria.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=10|10}% a velocidade de movimento por 8s após conseguir uma eliminação.

\u0410\u0432\u0430\u0440\u0438\u0439\u04.card_desc: [Незаметность] При уровне здоровья 30% и ниже вы входите в режим скрытности. Можно использовать каждые {scale=25|-5} с.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Перезарядка Дымовой завесы сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0414\u044b\u043c \u0438 \u043a\u0438\u.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Дымовая завеса каждую секунду исцеляет находящихся в ней союзников на 400 ед.

\u0417\u0430\u043c\u0435\u0448\u0430\u04.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] Каждое попадание по врагу Ядовитыми стрелами сокращает перезарядку Дымовой завесы на {scale=0.5|0.5} с.

\u0418\u0437\u043d\u0443\u0440\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] Урон от Ядовитых стрел повышается на 25%, а скорость нанесения урона – на 100%.

\u0418\u0441\u0446\u0435\u043b\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Попадание в Дымовую завесу исцеляет на {scale=100|100} ед. в течение 2 с.

\u041b\u043e\u0432\u043a\u0438\u0435 \u0.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] Активация Ядовитых стрел повышает скорость перезарядки на {scale=10|10}% на 5 с.

\u041d\u0438\u043d\u0434\u0437\u044f.card_desc: [Незаметность] Пока действует Незаметность, ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041e\u0434\u0440\u044f\u0445\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] При попаданиях Ядовитыми стрелами вы не расходуете боеприпасы в течение {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u041e\u0442\u0440\u0430\u0432\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Ядовитые стрелы] Перезарядка Ядовитых стрел сокращается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041f\u043b\u0430\u0449.card_desc: [Незаметность] Длительность действия Незаметности увеличивается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u041f\u043e\u0434\u0433\u043e\u0442\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Нанесение смертельного удара перезаряжает ваши способности и исцеляет вас на 500 ед.

\u041f\u0440\u0438\u0432\u0438\u0434\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Длительность Дымовой завесы увеличивается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0420\u0430\u0441\u0441\u0435\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Дымовая завеса] Попадание в Дымовую завесу увеличивает скорость передвижения на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0421\u0443\u043c\u0440\u0430\u0447\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=3|3} ед.

\u0423\u0441\u043a\u043e\u043b\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваша скорость передвижения вне боя повышается на {scale=3|3}%.

\u042d\u0439\u0444\u043e\u0440\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=10|10}% на 8 с. после устранения.

Dym i sztylet.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Zasłona dymna przywraca znajdującym się w niej sojusznikom 400 PZ co 1 s.

Lecznicze wyziewy.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Przywraca {scale=100|100} PZ na 2 s po wejściu w Zasłonę dymną.

Ninja.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=5|5}% podczas trwania Ukrycia.

Os\u0142abienie.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Zwiększa obrażenia zadawane przez Zatrute bełty o 25%, a szybkość zadawania obrażeń o 100%.

P\u0142aszcz.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Wydłuża czas trwania Ukrycia o {scale=1|1} s.

Prze\u015blizgni\u0119cie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=3|3}%, gdy jesteś poza walką.

Przygotowania.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zabójcze ciosy resetują wszystkie czasy odnowienia i przywracają ci 500 PZ.

Rozpad.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Celne trafienia Zatrutym bełtem wstrzymują zużywanie amunicji na {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Roztrwonienie.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s po wejściu w Zasłonę dymną.

Szybka zadymka.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Skraca czas odnowienia Zasłony dymnej o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Taktyczne prze\u0142adowanie.card_desc: [Broń] Wytwarza {scale=3|3} szt. amunicji po udanej eliminacji.

Trucicielka.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Skraca czas odnowienia Zatrutych bełtów o {scale=1|1} s.

Wsp\u00f3lnota cienia.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Skraca czas odnowienia Ukrycia o {scale=1|1} s.

Wyj\u015bcie awaryjne.card_desc: [Ukrycie] Gdy poziom twego zdrowia spadnie do poziomu 30% lub niżej, automatycznie wejdziesz w tryb ukrycia. Efekt ten może wystąpić raz na {scale=25|-5} s.

Zjawa.card_desc: [Zasłona dymna] Wydłuża czas trwania Zasłony dymnej o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Zmieszanie.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Skraca czas odnowienia Zasłony dymnej o {scale=0.5|0.5} s za każde trafienie wroga Zatrutymi bełtami.

Zr\u0119czne palce.card_desc: [Zatrute bełty] Zwiększa szybkość przeładowania o {scale=10|10}% na 5 s po użyciu Zatrutych bełtów.

Zwyci\u0119ski p\u0119d.card_desc: [Broń] Udana eliminacja zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=10|10}% na 8 s.

Acil \u00c7\u0131k\u0131\u015f.card_desc: [Gizli] %30 Canın altına düştüğün zaman otomatik olarak Gizlenme'ye girersin. Bu etki her {scale=25|-5} saniyede bir gerçekleşebilir.

\u00c7evik Parmaklar.card_desc: [Zehirli Oklar] Zehirli Oklar'ı etkinleştirdikten sonra Yeniden Doldurma Hızını 5sn boyunca %{scale=10|10} artır.

Da\u011f\u0131lma.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'ne girdikten sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} artır.

Dermans\u0131z.card_desc: [Zehirli Ok] Zehirli Oklar ile bir düşmanı vurduktan sonra {scale=0.6|0.6}sn boyunca cephane harcamazsın.

Duman ve Han\u00e7er.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi, içindeki müttefikleri her 1 saniyede 400 Can iyileştirir.

Haz\u0131rl\u0131k.card_desc: [Zırh] Öldürücü Darbeler, Bekleme Sürelerini sıfırlar ve seni 500 Can iyileştirir.

H\u0131zl\u0131 T\u00fctt\u00fcr\u00fcc\.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.

\u0130yile\u015ftiren Buharlar.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'ne girdikten sonra 2 saniyede {scale=100|100} Can iyileş.

Kafa Kar\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.card_desc: [Zehirli Oklar] Zehirli Oklar ile vurulan her düşman için Sis Perdesi'nin Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.5|0.5}sn azalt.

Ruh Gibi.card_desc: [Sis Perdesi] Sis Perdesi'nin süresini {scale=0.6|0.6} sn artır.

Taktiksel Doldurma.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra {scale=3|3} Cephane oluştur.

Zafer Ko\u015fusu.card_desc: [Silah] Bir Saf Dışı Bırakma yaptıktan sonra 8sn boyunca Hareket Hızı %{scale=10|10} artır.

Zay\u0131flat.card_desc: [Zehirli Okla] Zehirli Oklar'ın verdiği hasarı %25 ve hasar verme oranlarını %100 artır.

Zehirleyici.card_desc: [Zehirli Oklar] Zehirli Oklar'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=1|1}sn azalt.
